title: [SETUP-01] Create Repository Structure & Documentation Folders
body: Initialize Git repository structure with all required folders and documentation templates. Create README.md with project overview. Setup .gitignore for security files. Ensure all team members can access.

title: [SETUP-02] Create Environment Configuration Files
body: Document SSAS connection strings for Dev, UAT, Prod environments. Secure credentials using environment variables. Validate connectivity. Document fallback procedures.

title: [SETUP-03] Initialize Power BI Project File
body: Create initial Power BI Desktop file with proper structure. Apply theme and branding. Create report tabs: Overview, Detailed Analysis, Executive Summary. Configure RLS template.

title: [SETUP-04] Initialize Excel Template
body: Create Excel template file with Power Query structure. Setup macro framework for refresh button. Create sheet tabs for Summary and Pivot tables. Configure formulas.

title: [SETUP-05] Create PowerShell Script Stubs
body: Create template PowerShell scripts for data refresh. Build error notification functions. Add audit logging structure. Document parameter usage.

title: [SETUP-06] Set Up Git Branching & Workflows
body: Configure Git branching strategy (main/dev/feature). Create pull request template. Establish code review process. Setup branch protection on main.

title: [GOV-01] Configure SSAS Connectivity Tests
body: Setup automated tests for SSAS cube connectivity across environments. Create daily test schedule. Configure alert system for failures.

title: [GOV-02] Setup Audit Logging Framework
body: Create audit logging for all data access. Log Power BI events and Excel user activity. Retain logs for 90 days. Create audit dashboard.

title: [GOV-03] Configure Error Notification System
body: Setup automated error notifications for data refresh failures. Integrate with email, Slack, and Teams. Define escalation procedures.

title: [GOV-04] Setup Power BI Service Workspace & Security
body: Create Power BI Service workspace. Configure admin, member, and contributor roles. Setup RLS roles. Configure data gateway.

title: [DATA-01] Export SSAS Cube Schema & Documentation
body: Extract and document SSAS cube structure including measures, dimensions, and hierarchies. Create data dictionary. Document relationships.

title: [DATA-02] Query SSAS Cube & Validate Measure Data
body: Execute test queries against SSAS cube. Validate measure calculations for Revenue, Profit, Margin. Verify data completeness. Benchmark performance.

title: [DATA-03] Verify SSAS Relationships & Hierarchies
body: Validate relationships and hierarchies in SSAS cube. Test drill-down functionality. Verify aggregation paths. Confirm no circular references.

title: [DATA-04] Create SSAS Baseline for Validation
body: Create and store baseline dataset from SSAS as reference. Version-control baseline export. Record timestamp. Document validation procedures.

title: [DATA-05] Test Power BI SSAS Connection
body: Establish Power BI connection to SSAS cube. Test single user and service principal authentication. Validate connection performance.

title: [DATA-06] Verify Data Relationships in Power BI
body: Verify that SSAS relationships are properly imported in Power BI. Test many-to-many relationships. Validate cross-filter behavior.

title: [VIZ-01] Create Line Chart - Monthly Total Revenue
body: Create line chart showing monthly revenue trends (01/01/2024 to 03/31/2024). Add trend line. Format legend and labels. Enable interactive tooltip.

title: [VIZ-02] Create Bar Chart - Profit Margin by Region
body: Create bar chart (horizontal) showing profit margin by region (North, South, East, West). Add data labels. Apply color differentiation.

title: [VIZ-03] Create Table - Summary by Department
body: Create table with Department, Revenue, Cost, Profit, Margin% columns. Add total row. Apply conditional formatting on Margin%. Enable sorting.

title: [FILTER-01] Create Date Range Slicer
body: Create date range slicer with 90-day default. Connect to all visualizations. Enable between filter. Use MM/DD/YYYY format.

title: [FILTER-02] Create Department Multi-Select Slicer
body: Create multi-select department slicer. Enable Select All/None buttons. Connect to revenue and profit visualizations. Add clear button.

title: [FORMAT-01] Apply Corporate Branding & Colors
body: Apply corporate color palette to all visualizations. Set consistent font family. Add logo to report header. Verify branding guide compliance.

title: [TEST-US1-01] Test User Story 1 - Power BI Dashboard
body: Test all visualizations rendering. Verify slicer functionality. Check data refresh. Confirm performance (< 5 seconds). Publish to Power BI Service.

title: [EXCEL-01] Create Power Query Connection to SSAS (Excel)
body: Setup Power Query in Excel connecting to SSAS cube. Create and test SSAS query. Verify data refresh. Secure credentials.

title: [EXCEL-02] Create Summary Sheet
body: Create Excel summary sheet with Revenue, Profit, Margin metrics. Add monthly comparison. Include YoY growth calculations. Show update date.

title: [EXCEL-03] Create by-Region Pivot Sheet
body: Create pivot table showing data by region. Rows: regions, Columns: months. Show sum of revenue and profit. Enable drill-down and refresh.

title: [EXCEL-04] Create by-Department Pivot Sheet
body: Create pivot table showing data by department. Rows: departments, Columns: months. Show sum and average. Calculate department totals.

title: [EXCEL-05] Create Refresh Data Button
body: Add macro button to Summary sheet for refreshing all Power Query connections. Display status message. Implement error handling.

title: [TEST-US2-01] Test User Story 2 - Excel Report
body: Test all Excel sheets and Power Query connections. Verify pivot table refreshes. Check refresh button. Confirm performance. Share with team.

title: [REFRESH-01] Create PowerShell Refresh Execution Script
body: Create PowerShell script to execute data refresh. Implement error logging. Report completion status. Handle timeouts. Capture metrics.

title: [REFRESH-02] Configure Windows Task Scheduler
body: Configure Task Scheduler to run refresh script daily at 06:00 AM. Setup service account credentials. Enable retry logic (3 times).

title: [REFRESH-03] Log Monitoring & Verification
body: Setup monitoring for refresh logs. Create dashboard for refresh status. Configure failure alerts. Implement 90-day log retention.

title: [TEST-US3-01] Test User Story 3 - Automated Refresh
body: Test scheduled refresh execution. Verify data updates in all outputs. Check logs for errors. Test notifications. Verify rollback procedure.

title: [PROMOTE-01] Create Data Accuracy Validation Script
body: Create script comparing baseline SSAS data vs current data. Define variance threshold (< 0.1%). Setup automated alerts. Generate validation reports.

title: [PROMOTE-02] Create GitHub PR Workflow & Checklist
body: Create PR template with checklist. Document code review guidelines. Define approval workflow. Specify testing requirements.

title: [PROMOTE-03] Dev to UAT Promotion Test
body: Promote Power BI file, Excel template, and PowerShell scripts to UAT. Replicate SSAS configuration. Pass UAT validation. Verify with team.

title: [PROMOTE-04] UAT to Prod Promotion
body: Promote all artifacts to Production. Deploy Power BI to Service. Deploy Excel to network. Deploy scripts to prod server. Pass prod validation.

title: [TEST-US4-5-01] Test Promotion & Validation
body: Execute comprehensive testing post-promotion. Verify all artifacts in Prod. Validate data accuracy. Check security controls. Complete handoff to Operations.

title: [SEC-01] Configure Power BI Row-Level Security
body: Implement RLS in Power BI Service with Manager, Analyst, Viewer roles. Manager sees all regions. Analyst sees assigned region. Viewer sees summary.

title: [SEC-02] Setup Audit Logging for Power BI
body: Enable audit logging in Power BI tenant. Log user access, refresh events, and report access. Configure 90-day retention.

title: [SEC-03] Document Security & Access Procedures
body: Document access request process, password policy, and MFA requirements. Create role definitions and security incident response plan.

title: [DOC-01] Create Deployment Guide
body: Create step-by-step deployment guide. Document environment-specific configs. Include prerequisites, troubleshooting, and screenshots.

title: [DOC-02] Create Troubleshooting Guide
body: Document common issues with symptoms and resolutions. Include log file locations and escalation paths. Update monthly.

title: [DOC-03] Create User Guide for Finance Team
body: Create user guide for dashboard navigation, metrics definitions, filter usage, and refresh procedures. Include FAQs and examples.

title: [DOC-04] Create Admin Runbook
body: Create operations runbook with weekly checks, monthly maintenance, backup procedures, monitoring setup, and emergency response procedures.

title: [FINAL-01] End-to-End Integration Test
body: Execute final integration test. Verify all user stories. Test cross-system integration. Confirm performance under load. Test backup/recovery.

title: [FINAL-02] Production Deployment & Monitoring
body: Deploy to production. Activate monitoring dashboards. Configure alert thresholds. Establish on-call procedures. Complete post-deployment review.
